mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.password, u.email, u.avatar, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.role, COALESCE(u.display_name, s.name) AS display_name, COALESCE(u.phone, s.phone) AS user_phone, s.student_id AS student_id_str, s.phone AS student_phone FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN student s ON u.id = s.user_id

SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.password, u.email, u.avatar, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.role, COALESCE(u.display_name, s.name) AS display_name, COALESCE(u.phone, s.phone) AS user_phone, s.student_id AS student_id_str, s.phone AS student_phone FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN student s ON u.id = s.user_id WHERE u.username = #{username}
